Key Match Events: Brazil were denied a first-half penalty
Pre-Game Insights: Dorival Junior emphasized the importance of breaking down a defensive block
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior expressed frustration at not achieving expected outcomes
Gustavo Alfaro praised his team's defensive effort and spirit
Miscellaneous Highlights: Costa Rica's deep defending worked to plan against Brazil
The pitch became small due to Costa Rica's defensive setup
Brazil had 48 touches in the box throughout the 90 minutes
Others: Brazil's 17-year-old Endrick was brought on to replace Vinicius Junior
Costa Rica's Juan Pablo Vargas expertly marshalled a three-man central defence
